name: Piñatas (Day 5: A Game a Day)
description:
Piñatas
(Warning: includes fast-paced colorful screen shakes)

Try to fire away and destroy the piñata endlessly within the time limit. 

This is the 5th game of my Game a Day challenge. I'll be making a game from scratch every single day until July 1st. To learn more about it, click this link. https://anxietymonstergames.wordpress.com/2018/06/01/a-game-a-day-blog/ 

Control
Move with the mouse to aim
Fire with the left Click

Credits
Free Music Archive
Komiku - First Dance
Based on a youtube tutorial by RedFoc Tutorial
